description:
All Jia Nan had wanted was to summon a spirit beast that could do his laundry and cook for him, so what was the deal with this big fox with nine tails?!

Forget about having his laundry and cooking done, he would just be glad to not have to wait upon this fox…

In short, this is the story of a loser sorcerer with an arrogant nine-tailed fox who wanders the Great Wilderness and eventually becomes an arrogant Great Sorcerer…
